City News

  1.  

  1. Get Ready to Vote by Mail

    Rockville’s 2019 election will be conducted by mail. Be sure your ballot gets to you: • Check your address. • Update your information. • Register to vote. Learn more...

  1. Rockville to Celebrate Earth Month with Activities Throughout Spring

    Rockville will mark Earth Month with a monthlong celebration – and bonus events in early May, including activities – most of them free – aimed at environmental sustainability. Additional Info...

  1. New Hotline, Website Offer a Way to Report Potential Fraud, Waste and Abuse

    Rockville now offers a telephone hotline and website for community members to use to report potential fraud, waste and abuse related to city government services and employees. Additional Info...
